      public static long getMoveTimer()

    • deregisterConnection

      static void deregisterConnection​(SocketClientConnection c)
      Parameters:
      c - is the client kicked from server

    • firstPlayer

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> firstPlayer​(SocketClientConnection c)
      Asks the first player to input the playerNumber and the choice of gods. NB: in case the maximum number of players is 2, the function does not ask for the number of players.
      Parameters:
      c - connection of first player
      Returns:
      array of integers; in the first position resides playerNumber, while the next 2/3 positions contain the gods

    • lobby

      void lobby​(SocketClientConnection c, java.lang.String name) throws java.lang.Exception
      Parameters:
      c - is the client connection
      name - is the Nickname
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • clearLobby

      private void clearLobby() throws BrokenLobbyException
      Throws:
      BrokenLobbyException

    • lobbyFromDisk

      void lobbyFromDisk​(SocketClientConnection c, java.lang.String name, int gameIndex) throws NickAlreadyTakenException
      Same as lobby(SocketClientConnection, String), except it's used to re-create a game loaded from disk.
      Parameters:
      c - Client connection to be added
      name - Client nickname to be added
      gameIndex - Index of game to be resumed
      Throws:
      NickAlreadyTakenException - if a player with the same nickname is already in game

      public void run()
